CustomField.description:
This is the transaction ID created when the record was created
Some of the values are as follows:
‘PORCPT’ – if created by a purchase receipt
‘INVLOCADD’ – if created by an inventory location addition
‘INVLOCADJ’ – if created by an adjustment (up)
‘WOISSR’ – if created by a work order issue reversal
‘SOISSR’ – if created by a sales order pick reversal. (DD)
CustomField.label: Txn ID
